bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, double-butted top and down tubes, machined head tube, gussetted down tube, forged dropouts with replaceable hanger

Tektro SB-924, alloy linear pull, stainless steel pipe, 60mm AW pads
Tektro SB-924, alloy linear pull, stainless steel pipe, 60mm AW pads
TruVativ X-forge, forged alloy 160mm w/ chain guard, capless bolts
TH, BB-7420, square taper, 68x113mm, sealed cartridge bearing, drive side crank stops
Junior resin body, steel cage (toe clip compatible)
Alex 24", alloy, double wall, pinned w/ CNC side walls
Alloy, 32 hole, alloy QR, freewheel type
14g stainless steel, brass nipples (Front: L239/R239mm Rear: L237/R236mm)
Specialized forged alloy, 31.8mm I.D., w/alloy QR
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
